name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Make a delightful, tasty, and simple recipe of chicken alfredo using ingredients that can be found at home. Recipe is simple to follow and fun to follow!

steps.instruction: Heat oil into a skillet at medium heat. Add butter and grate a small portion of garlic for flavour into the skillet. Add chicken breast into skillet and cook each side for 10 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
Once cooked, remove from skillet and slice it into long strips of chicken, once it is cool enough to handle.
Add alfredo sauce to a pan at medium heat, and once heated, add pasta into pan. Stir until the sauce has thickened and the pasta is soft.
Remove heat and add chicken to pan. Serve whenever you wish to eat.
